verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah, <S%H3050><s%> for it is good <S%H2896><s%> to sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to our God; <S%H430><s%> for it is pleasant <S%H5273><s%> and fitting <S%H5000><s%> to praise him. <S%H8416><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> builds up <S%H1129><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> He gathers together <S%H3664><s%> the outcasts <S%H1760><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
He heals <S%H7495><s%> the broken <S%H7665><s%> in heart, <S%H3820><s%> and binds up <S%H2280><s%> their wounds. <S%H6094><s%>
He counts <S%H4487><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of the stars. <S%H3556><s%> He calls <S%H7121><s%> them all by their names. <S%H8034><s%>
Great <S%H1419><s%> is our Lord, <S%H113><s%> and mighty <S%H7227><s%> in power. <S%H3581><s%> His understanding <S%H8394><s%> is infinite. <S%H4557><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> upholds <S%H5749><s%> the humble. <S%H6035><s%> He brings <S%H8213><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> down <S%H8213><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>
Sing <S%H6030><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with thanksgiving. <S%H8426><s%> Sing praises <S%H2167><s%> on the harp <S%H3658><s%> to our God, <S%H430><s%>

who covers <S%H3680><s%> the sky <S%H8064><s%> with clouds, <S%H5645><s%> who prepares <S%H3559><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> for the earth, <S%H776><s%> who makes grass <S%H2682><s%> grow <S%H6779><s%> on the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>
He provides <S%H5414><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> for the livestock, <S%H929><s%> and for the young <S%H1121><s%> ravens <S%H6158><s%> when they call. <S%H7121><s%>
He doesn't <S%H2654><s%> delight in the strength <S%H1369><s%> of the horse. <S%H5483><s%> He takes no pleasure <S%H7521><s%> in the legs <S%H7785><s%> of a man. <S%H376><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> takes pleasure <S%H7521><s%> in those who fear <S%H3373><s%> him, <S%H3176><s%> in those who hope in his loving kindness. <S%H2617><s%>
Praise <S%H7623><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> Jerusalem! <S%H3389><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> Zion! <S%H6726><s%>
For he has strengthened <S%H2388><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> of your gates. <S%H8179><s%> He has blessed <S%H1288><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> inside you. <S%H7130><s%>
He makes <S%H7760><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in your borders. <S%H1366><s%> He fills <S%H7646><s%> you with the finest <S%H2459><s%> of the wheat. <S%H2406><s%>
He sends out <S%H7971><s%> his commandment <S%H565><s%> to the earth. <S%H776><s%> His word <S%H1697><s%> runs <S%H7323><s%> very swiftly. <S%H4120><s%>
He gives <S%H5414><s%> snow <S%H7950><s%> like wool, <S%H6785><s%> and scatters <S%H6340><s%> frost <S%H3713><s%> like ashes. <S%H665><s%>
He hurls down <S%H7993><s%> his hail <S%H7140><s%> like pebbles. <S%H6595><s%> Who can stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his cold? <S%H7135><s%>
He sends out <S%H7971><s%> his word, <S%H1697><s%> and melts <S%H4529><s%> them. <S%H7307><s%> He causes his wind to blow, <S%H5380><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> flow. <S%H5140><s%>
He shows <S%H5046><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%> to Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> his statutes <S%H2706><s%> and his ordinances <S%H4941><s%> to Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
He has not done <S%H6213><s%> this for just any nation. <S%H1471><s%> They don't <S%H3045><s%> know his ordinances. <S%H4941><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%>
